text: <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Promotes B Cell Survival and Proliferation In Vitro
( A ) MTS assay of splenocytes from WT and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic mice .
Splenocytes were cultured in the presence ( grey bars ) or absence ( black bars ) of <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for 3 d .

The results are the mean +/- SEM of triplicate samples averaged from multiple mice where " n " the number of mice analyzed is as follows : n = 2 for WT lymphocytes and WT lymphomas , n = 11 for <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphocytes , and n = 13 for <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphomas .

( B ) EMA exclusion of <extra_id_0> CD19 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + gated splenocytes from WT and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic mice showing percentage of viable B cells cultured with ( white bars ) or without ( black bars ) <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for 2 d .

( C ) Flow cytometry analysis for incorporated BrdU in WT and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphoma cells cultured with or without <extra_id_0> IL4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for 2 d . Shown are the results from WT lymphoma 1 and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphoma 2 .
Percentages of cells in each quadrant are shown .
